dl.dd: Returns the index of the XULElem("browser") for the specified document in the XULElem("tabbrowser") the method was invoked on. The returned index is dependent on the XULElem("tab")s in the XULElem("tabbrowser") and is invalidated when the tab ordering changes. It should not be used to track per-tab data during a session; the use of XULAttr("linkedpanel") on the corresponding tab is preferred instead.
